price: Потом смо вам, и после тога, опростили, да бисте захвални били.
arabic: ثُمَّ عَفَوۡنَا عَنكُم مِّنۢ بَعۡدِ ذَٰلِكَ لَعَلَّكُمۡ تَشۡكُرُونَ

version.title: Serbian Translation - Rowwad Translation Center
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Serbian by Rowwad Translation Center in cooperation with Islamhouse.com

meta.transliteration: thumma ʿafawnā ʿankum min baʿdi dhālika laʿallakum tashkurūna
